alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Northern Saratoga; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Fulton; Southern Washington; Western Albany; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 15 at 12:15PM EST until January 17 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation of snow and sleet and some freezing rain possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze are pontetially possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Windham County in southern Vermont and the Glens Falls Saratoga Region, Upper Hudson Valley, and Helderbergs in eastern New York. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult Sunday night into Monday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
